text: Working with the abstraction Transfer function for example x =5 // label(x) = Nz © Nz OR =MZ z = -5 // label(z) = NZ .z+z=zZ p= 0 // label(p) = Z .z*Nz=Z =b?1: = x=b?1 : 0 // label (x) MZ o NZ *NZ =NZ y=y*0// label(x) = Z Join function for example ot a % 8 S B * Join(NZ, Nz) > Nz b = -3; b = Nz; i * Join(z, Nz) > Mz c=a * b; c = NZ; d=0; d = 2; * Join(Mz, *) > Mz | e=c*d; e=Z; .ﬂ sy * £=10/e; £ = Nz; 4= Division by zero indicated by the NZ label "zu Köln J 23
